item.title: Venus Vacation PRISM: DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme adds Nanami, launches March 6, 2025 in Japan and Asia
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/venus-vacation-prism-dead-or-alive-xtreme-adds-nanami-launches-march-6-2025-in-japan-and-asia

“Immersive romance adventure game” Venus Vacation PRISM: DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme will launch for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam and DMM Games Player on March 6, 2025 in Japan and Asia with English language support, publisher Koei Tecmo and developer Team NINJA announced. Nanami was also announced as the final romanceable character, joining Honoka, Tamaki, Elise, Fiona, and Misaki.

The game will be available both physically and digitally for PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4, and digitally for PC. Pre-orders include the “Plumeria Hair Ornament” set of six hairstyles, which can be worn in-game by the six romanceable characters. Early purchases include the “Cheongsam” set of six outfits, which can also be worn by the six characters. Users who link the game with DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme: Venus Vacation will receive the SSR swimsuit for Misaki “Resort Cami Dress (Blue)” for use in DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme: Venus Vacation.

A Digital Deluxe Edition of the game will also be available, which includes a set of six special costumes designed by illustrator Yom, a set of episodes in collaboration with illustrator Yom, an early unlock of the photograph feature “Time-Stopping Hourglass,” and six types of “Photo Frames” that can be used while taking photographs in the game.

Here is an overview of the game, via its official website:

■ Story

On this island, the moment of love.

On the Venus Islands, a perpetual-summer paradise, you as the appointed owner are preparing for a large festival with the part-time staff Misaki. Misaki suddenly speaks up.

Hey, Boss. Did you know?

About the story of the “Prismatic Meteor Shower” that can soon be seen on this island… “On a night when stars rain down, the souls of those who wish upon the iridescent starlight…” On this island, you will meet six Venuses.

■ Characters

Misaki (voiced by Minami Tsuda)

  • Age: 18
  • Height: 156cm
  • Measurements: B85 / W54 / H89
  • Blood Type: A
  • Occupation: Student
  • Hobbies: Diving, Stargazing, Reading Manga
  • Favorite Food: Mango Vanilla Crepes
  • Favorite Color: Orange
  • Birthday: July 7

A part-time staff always supporting the Boss. An “ordinary” girl you might find anywhere. She actively engages in conversations with other girls, creating a friendly atmosphere. However, beneath her outgoing demeanor lies a shy personality; she struggles with self-confidence and often finds it challenging to take that first step forward.

Fiona (voiced by Kaede Hondo)

  • Age: 18
  • Height: 152cm
  • Measurements: B88 / W55 / H84
  • Blood Type: O
  • Occupation: Princess
  • Hobbies: Ballroom Dance
  • Favorite Food: Chocolate Fondant, Herbal Tea
  • Favorite Color: Wisteria
  • Birthday: February 11

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=enablejsapi

A beautiful girl who visits the island to meet the Boss. A love-struck princess. Deeply devoted to the Boss, she passionately strives for love and gives her all in everything she does. However, her close proximity can sometimes lead to heart-pounding moments…!

Elise (voiced by Asami Seto)

  • Age: 22
  • Height: 168 cm
  • Measurements: B94 / W58 / H90
  • Blood Type: A
  • Occupation: Life Coach
  • Hobbies: Collecting Stationery, Obtaining Licenses
  • Favorite Food: Stollen, Jelly Drink
  • Favorite Color: Snow White
  • Birthday: September 3

A beautiful supervisor with a strong sense of responsibility and a calm demeanor. Due to unsatisfactory festival results, she is dispatched from the office for oversight. While her approach is businesslike, she understands the importance of give-and-take in her interactions.

Tamaki (voiced by Saori Onishi)

  • Age: 22
  • Height: 169cm
  • Measurements: B84 / W54 / H87
  • Blood Type: B
  • Occupation: Fashion Designer
  • Hobbies: Bouldering, Yoga, Bar Hopping
  • Favorite Food: Macaroons, Soda Water, Alcohol
  • Favorite Color: Turqouis Blue
  • Birthday: August 19

A sexy girl visiting the island for a specific purpose, a designer who was formerly a model. Passionate about beauty, she dedicates herself fully to both her own appearance and that of others. With a blend of sophistication and a sexy aura, she embodies the essence of an elegant grown-up woman.

Honoka (voiced by Ai Nonoka)

  • Age: 18
  • Height: 150cm
  • Measurements: B99 / W58 / H91
  • Blood Type: AB
  • Occupation: Student
  • Hobbies: Bathing, Watching Pro Wrestling, Watching Fighting Movies
  • Favorite Food: Whipped Cream Puffs
  • Favorite Color: Cream
  • Birthday: March 24

Raised by her kind grandmother, she is a laid-back schoolgirl with a secret. Her warm personality brings comfort and joy to those around her. While visiting the Island for sightseeing, Honoka is scouted by the Boss while she is at the pier…

Nanami (voiced by Miyuri Shimabukuro)

  • Age: 18 Years Old
  • Height: 158cm
  • Measurements: B88 / W54 / H87
  • Blood Type: O
  • Occupation: Student
  • Hobbies: Watching Movies, Track, Browsing General Stores
  • Favorite Food: Tonkotsu Ramen, Coffee
  • Favorite Color: Emerald Green
  • Birthday: April 16

A beautiful girl with an aura that effortlessly draws attention, embodying a relatable and genuine charm. Visiting the Venus Islands to meet Misaki, who was her classmate in middle school, she unexpectedly encounters the Boss while waiting for Misaki at the beach…

■ System

Choices: Experience True Love on This Perpetual-Summer Island

As the owner, you will encounter numerous beautiful girls. The stories with them unfold based on your choices, leading to multiple unqiue endings. You’ll find yourself captivated by casual gestures and moments when the distance between you closes. You might find yourself blissfully agonizing over which girl to choose…

Come and experience true love on this heavenly island where summer never ends!

Photos: Capture Special Moments, Just the Two of You

Enjoy lighthearted conversations, offer advice, or spend special time on dates together… Those precious moments can always be eternalized in photos. Whether it’s her carefree smile, her flawless profile gazing at the sunset and sea, or her shy, sparkling eyes – preserve the best memories not only in your heart, but in pictures.

item.title: Otome visual novel DYNAMIC CHORD feat. [reve parfait] Remaster edition announced for Switch
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/10/otome-visual-novel-dynamic-chord-feat-reve-parfait-remaster-edition-announced-for-switch

  • Switch

Due out on March 27, 2025 in Japan.

Publisher dramatic create and developer honeybee black have announced otome visual novel DYNAMIC CHORD feat. [reve parfait] Remaster edition for Switch. It will launch on March 27, 2025 in Japan for 7,480 yen.

DYNAMIC CHORD feat. [reve parfait] Remaster edition is a port of DYNAMIC CHORD feat. [reve parfait], which was originally released for PC on December 26, 2014 in Japan, followed by PS Vita on September 29, 2016.

The Switch version will feature a completely new song and new opening movie, bo xart with newly illustrated visuals, and the scenario from the drama CD “Vacation Trip CD series [reve parfait],” arranged and novelized for the game.

Here is the game’s story synopsis, via VNDB:

Second year high school student Atano Rio has childhood friends. They are Kashii Reon and his older brother Kashii Aki. However, due to a certain incident, she has become estranged from Reon.

One day, Rio is lead to a certain studio by Kuon, whom is an upperclassman she’s close to and also Aki’s friend. It is there that she learns that the three—Reon, Aki and Kuon—had formed a band together. However, their band’s bassist had dropped out…

The love between you and the high school band-men aiming for a major debut… Where will it lead?

item.title: Showa American Story launches in 2025, five-minute trailer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/10/showa-american-story-launches-in-2025-five-minute-trailer

  • PC
  • PS5

PlayStation 4 version no longer planned.

Showa American Story, a “post-apocalyptic romance RPG” and “alternate history ensemble period drama,” will launch for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam in 2025, publisher 2P Games and developer NEKCOM Games announced. The previously announced PlayStation 4 version is no longer planned.

A five-minute trailer announcing the release window was also debuted, which introduces a new boss character named Shogun. Speaking to IGN, creative director XY.Luo said, “Shogun is a boss character who stands 6 meters tall. He uses the giraffe’s long neck to strike, and he can also fly, throwing his shield to attack the player.”

Showa American Story is a road movie-style action RPG in which you travel across America as protagonist Chouko Chigusa in a camper van and motorcycle, visiting locations such as New Yokohama (Hollywood), San Francisco, Las Vegas, and Neo Tokyo-4 (Austin, Texas), and Mount Rushmore. Along the way, she fights zombies and strange creatures in action-based combat, utilizing swords, guns, and various other weapons.

item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/10/dragon-quest-iii-hd-2d-remake-launch-trailer

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

RPG remake due out on November 14 worldwide.

Publisher Square Enix and developer Artdink Corporation have released the launch trailer for Dragon Quest III HD-2D Remake, as well as a pair of smaller trailers.

Here is an overview of the game, via Square Enix:

About

Dragon Quest III HD-2D Remake is a stunning reimagining of the beloved masterpiece and narrative beginning to The Erdrick Trilogy.

Story

Years ago, the great hero Ortega bid farewell to his wife and child as he set off on a quest to defeat the villainous Archfiend, Baramos. Ortega failed his quest, and Baramos still threatens the world. Now, on their sixteenth birthday, Ortega’s only child is summoned by the king of Aliahan and entrusted with a mission of the highest import: to take on Ortega’s quest, vanquish Baramos, and save the world.

Key Features

  • Build Your Perfect Party – Recruit a variety of allies, with three able to join your party to aid you on your quest. Choose their vocations, appearances and their voices. There’s even a brand new vocation exclusive to this remake: the monster wrangler!
  • Travel Across an Expansive Open World – Explore a wealth of towns, castles, caves, towers and dungeons to explore on your adventure, with hidden secrets waiting to be discovered.
  • Strategic, Turn-Based Battles – Battle a vast array of monsters in classic Dragon Quest turn-based battles. Set party tactics and switch up weapons, abilities and spells to take on all of the challenging foes that await you.

Dragon Quest III HD-2D Remake is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on November 14 worldwide. Read more about the game here, here, here, and here.
